HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Mon, 07 Oct 2013 00:08:49 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.22 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.2.22 OpenSSL/1.0.0-fips mod_auth_passthrough/2.1 mod_bwlimited/1.4 FrontPage/5.0.2.2635

href="/wp-content/themes/mkyong-ma/images/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" /><script type='text/javascript' src='http://www.mkyong.com/wp-includes/js/comment-reply.min.js?ver=3.6'></script><link rel='prev' title='How to validate username with regular expression' href='http://www.mkyong.com/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-username-with-regular-expression/' /><link rel='next' title='How to validate IP address with regular expression' href='http://www.mkyong.com/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-ip-address-with-regular-expression/' /><link rel='shortlink' Tutorials</div><div class="dropdown-item"> <a href="/tutorials/android-tutorial/"><div class="images img-border img-android img-holder"></div> </a><div>1. <a href="/tutorials/android-tutorial/">Android Core</a></div></div></div></li><li class="menu-topround"> <a href="#">Others</a><div id="misc-menu" class="dropdown"><div class="dropdown-item"><ol><li><a MongoDB</a></li><li><a href="/tutorials/junit-tutorials/">jUnit</a></li><li><a href="/tutorials/testng-tutorials/">TestNG</a></li><li><a href="/tutorials/jquery-tutorials/">jQuery</a></li><li><a href="/tutorials/quartz-scheduler-tutorial/">Quartz Scheduler</a></li></ol></div></div></li></ul><div style="float:right;margin:4px 0"><form action="/search/" id="cse-search-box"><div> <input type="hidden" name="cx" value="partner-pub-2836379775501347:3714346998" /> <input type="hidden" name="cof" value="FORID:10" /> <input type="hidden" name="ie" value="UTF-8" /> <input type="text" name="q" size="30" style="height:20px;font-size:10pt;" /> <input type="submit" name="sa" value="Search" style="height:25px;"  /></div></form></div></div></div><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="span10"><!-- google_ad_section_start(name=mkyongregion) --><div id="post-container"> <article class="post" id="post-1925"><header><h1> How to validate image file extension with regular expression</h1><div class='post-meta'><div id="small-author-avatar"> <img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/622c70d2908e68ecc070ca6754245bb2?s=40&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mkyong.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Fmkyongnew%2Fimages%2Favatar-guest.jpg%3Fs%3D40&amp;r=G' class='avatar avatar-40 photo' height='40' width='40' /></div><div> Posted on <time datetime="2009-11-06T19:31:20+00:00">November 6, 2009</time><span> , &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Last modified : August 30, 2012 </span><div> By <a href="http://www.mkyong.com/author/mkyong/" rel="author">mkyong</a></div></div></div> </header><div class="post-content"><div id='dd_light_ajax_float'><div id='dd_content_wrap'><div class='dd_light_button'><div class='dd-loading' id='dd-google' ></div><div class='g-plusone' data-size='tall'></div></div><div class='dd_light_button'><div class='dd-loading' id='dd-fblike' ></div><iframe id='dd-fblike-iframe' src='' height='0' width='0' scrolling='no' frameborder='0'></iframe></div><div class='dd_light_button'><div class='dd-loading' id='dd-twitter' ></div><a href='https://twitter.com/share' class='twitter-share-button' data-via='mkyong' data-count='vertical'></a></div></div></div><p>Image File Extension Regular Expression Pattern</p><div class="wp_syntax"><div class="code"><pre class="java" style="font-family:monospace;"><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #339933;">^</span>\s<span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #339933;">+</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>\.<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #339933;">?</span>i<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>jpg<span style="color: #339933;">|</span>png<span style="color: #339933;">|</span>gif<span style="color: #339933;">|</span>bmp<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>$<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span></pre></div></div><p>Description</p><div class="wp_syntax"><div class="code"><pre class="java" style="font-family:monospace;"><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>			#Start of the group #<span style="color: #cc66cc;">1</span>
 <span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #339933;">^</span>\s<span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #339933;">+</span>			#  must contains one or more anything <span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>except white space<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>
       <span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>		#    start of the group #<span style="color: #cc66cc;">2</span>
         \.		#	follow by a dot <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;.&quot;</span>
         <span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #339933;">?</span>i<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>		#	ignore the <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">case</span> sensive checking <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">for</span> the following characters
             <span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>		#	  start of the group #<span style="color: #cc66cc;">3</span>
              jpg	#	    contains characters <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;jpg&quot;</span>
              <span style="color: #339933;">|</span>		#	    ..<span style="color: #006633;">or</span>
              png	#	    contains characters <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;png&quot;</span>
              <span style="color: #339933;">|</span>		#	    ..<span style="color: #006633;">or</span>
              gif	#	    contains characters <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;gif&quot;</span>
              <span style="color: #339933;">|</span>		#	    ..<span style="color: #006633;">or</span>
              bmp	#	    contains characters <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;bmp&quot;</span>
             <span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>		#	  end of the group #<span style="color: #cc66cc;">3</span>
       <span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>		#     end of the group #<span style="color: #cc66cc;">2</span>	
  $			#  end of the string
<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>			#end of the group #<span style="color: #cc66cc;">1</span></pre></div></div><p>Whole combination is means, must have 1 or more strings (but not white space), follow by dot &#8220;.&#8221; and string end in &#8220;jpg&#8221; or &#8220;png&#8221; or &#8220;gif&#8221; or &#8220;bmp&#8221; , and the file extensive is case-insensitive.</p><p>This regular expression pattern is widely use in for different file extensive checking. You can just change the end combination <b>(jpg|png|gif|bmp)</b> to come out different file extension checking that suit your need.</p><h4>Java Regular Expression Example</h4><div class="wp_syntax"><div class="code"><pre class="java" style="font-family:monospace;"><span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">package</span> <span style="color: #006699;">com.mkyong.regex</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">import</span> <span style="color: #006699;">java.util.regex.Matcher</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">import</span> <span style="color: #006699;">java.util.regex.Pattern</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">class</span> ImageValidator<span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
&nbsp;
   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">private</span> Pattern pattern<span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">private</span> Matcher matcher<span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">private</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">static</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">final</span> <span style="color: #003399;">String</span> IMAGE_PATTERN <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> 
                <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;([^<span style="color: #000099; font-weight: bold;">\\</span>s]+(<span style="color: #000099; font-weight: bold;">\\</span>.(?i)(jpg|png|gif|bmp))$)&quot;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> ImageValidator<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
	  pattern <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> Pattern.<span style="color: #006633;">compile</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>IMAGE_PATTERN<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
   <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
&nbsp;
   <span style="color: #008000; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold;">/**
   * Validate image with regular expression
   * @param image image for validation
   * @return true valid image, false invalid image
   */</span>
   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">boolean</span> validate<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">final</span> <span style="color: #003399;">String</span> image<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
&nbsp;
	  matcher <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> pattern.<span style="color: #006633;">matcher</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>image<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
	  <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">return</span> matcher.<span style="color: #006633;">matches</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
   <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
<span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span></pre></div></div><div><div style="margin:20px 0;"><script type="text/javascript">google_ad_client="pub-2836379775501347";google_ad_slot="7391621200";google_ad_width=728;google_ad_height=90;google_ad_region="mkyongregion";</script><script type="text/javascript"
src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js"></script></div></div><h4>Image file that match:</h4><p>1. &#8220;a.jpg&#8221;, &#8220;a.gif&#8221;,&#8221;a.png&#8221;, &#8220;a.bmp&#8221;,<br /> 2. &#8220;..jpg&#8221;, &#8220;..gif&#8221;,&#8221;..png&#8221;, &#8220;..bmp&#8221;,<br /> 3. &#8220;a.JPG&#8221;, &#8220;a.GIF&#8221;,&#8221;a.PNG&#8221;, &#8220;a.BMP&#8221;,<br /> 4. &#8220;a.JpG&#8221;, &#8220;a.GiF&#8221;,&#8221;a.PnG&#8221;, &#8220;a.BmP&#8221;,<br /> 5. &#8220;jpg.jpg&#8221;, &#8220;gif.gif&#8221;,&#8221;png.png&#8221;, &#8220;bmp.bmp&#8221;</p><h4>Image that doesnâ€™t match:</h4><p>1. &#8220;.jpg&#8221;, &#8220;.gif&#8221;,&#8221;.png&#8221;,&#8221;.bmp&#8221; &#8211; image file name is required<br /> 2. &#8221; .jpg&#8221;, &#8221; .gif&#8221;,&#8221; .png&#8221;,&#8221; .bmp&#8221; &#8211; White space is not allow in first character<br /> 3. &#8220;a.txt&#8221;, &#8220;a.exe&#8221;,&#8221;a.&#8221;,&#8221;a.mp3&#8243; &#8211; Only image file extension is allow<br /> 3. &#8220;jpg&#8221;, &#8220;gif&#8221;,&#8221;png&#8221;,&#8221;bmp&#8221; &#8211; image file extension is required</p><h4>Unit Test &#8211; ImageValidator</h4><div class="wp_syntax"><div class="code"><pre class="java" style="font-family:monospace;"><span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">package</span> <span style="color: #006699;">com.mkyong.regex</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">import</span> <span style="color: #006699;">org.testng.Assert</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">import</span> <span style="color: #006699;">org.testng.annotations.*</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
<span style="color: #008000; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold;">/**
 * Image validator Testing
 * @author mkyong
 *
 */</span>
<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">class</span> ImageValidatorTest <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
&nbsp;
	<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">private</span> ImageValidator imageValidator<span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
&nbsp;
	@BeforeClass
        <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">void</span> initData<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
		imageValidator <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">new</span> ImageValidator<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
        <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
&nbsp;
	@DataProvider
	<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Object</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span> ValidImageProvider<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span> <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
	   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">return</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">new</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Object</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
    	     <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span><span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">new</span> <span style="color: #003399;">String</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span> <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.jpg&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.gif&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.png&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.bmp&quot;</span>,
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;..jpg&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;..gif&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;..png&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;..bmp&quot;</span>,
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.JPG&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.GIF&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.PNG&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.BMP&quot;</span>,
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.JpG&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.GiF&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.PnG&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.BmP&quot;</span>,
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;jpg.jpg&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;gif.gif&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;png.png&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;bmp.bmp&quot;</span>
  	       <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
              <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
	   <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
	<span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
&nbsp;
	@DataProvider
	<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Object</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span> InvalidImageProvider<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span> <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
	  <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">return</span> <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">new</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Object</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
	    <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span><span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">new</span> <span style="color: #003399;">String</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span> <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;.jpg&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;.gif&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;.png&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;.bmp&quot;</span>,
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot; .jpg&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot; .gif&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot; .png&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot; .bmp&quot;</span>,
                   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.txt&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.exe&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;a.mp3&quot;</span>,
		   <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;jpg&quot;</span>, <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;gif&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;png&quot;</span>,<span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;bmp&quot;</span>
	       <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
             <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
	   <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
	<span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
&nbsp;
	@Test<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>dataProvider <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;ValidImageProvider&quot;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>
	 <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">void</span> ValidImageTest<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #003399;">String</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Image</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span> <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
&nbsp;
	   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">for</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #003399;">String</span> temp <span style="color: #339933;">:</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Image</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
		   <span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">boolean</span> valid <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> imageValidator.<span style="color: #006633;">validate</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>temp<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
		   <span style="color: #003399;">System</span>.<span style="color: #006633;">out</span>.<span style="color: #006633;">println</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;Image is valid : &quot;</span> <span style="color: #339933;">+</span> temp <span style="color: #339933;">+</span> <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot; , &quot;</span> <span style="color: #339933;">+</span> valid<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
		   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">Assert</span>.<span style="color: #006633;">assertEquals</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">true</span>, valid<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
	   <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
&nbsp;
	<span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
&nbsp;
	@Test<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>dataProvider <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;InvalidImageProvider&quot;</span>, 
                 dependsOnMethods<span style="color: #339933;">=</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;ValidImageTest&quot;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span>
	<span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">public</span> <span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">void</span> InValidImageTest<span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #003399;">String</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#91;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#93;</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Image</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span> <span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
&nbsp;
	   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">for</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #003399;">String</span> temp <span style="color: #339933;">:</span> <span style="color: #003399;">Image</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#123;</span>
		   <span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">boolean</span> valid <span style="color: #339933;">=</span> imageValidator.<span style="color: #006633;">validate</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span>temp<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
		   <span style="color: #003399;">System</span>.<span style="color: #006633;">out</span>.<span style="color: #006633;">println</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot;Image is valid : &quot;</span> <span style="color: #339933;">+</span> temp <span style="color: #339933;">+</span> <span style="color: #0000ff;">&quot; , &quot;</span> <span style="color: #339933;">+</span> valid<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
		   <span style="color: #000000; font-weight: bold;">Assert</span>.<span style="color: #006633;">assertEquals</span><span style="color: #009900;">&#40;</span><span style="color: #000066; font-weight: bold;">false</span>, valid<span style="color: #009900;">&#41;</span><span style="color: #339933;">;</span>
	   <span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>
	<span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span>	
<span style="color: #009900;">&#125;</span></pre></div></div><h4>Unit Test &#8211; Result</h4><div class="wp_syntax"><div class="code"><pre class="xml" style="font-family:monospace;">Image is valid : a.jpg , true
Image is valid : a.gif , true
Image is valid : a.png , true
Image is valid : a.bmp , true
Image is valid : ..jpg , true
Image is valid : ..gif , true
Image is valid : ..png , true
Image is valid : ..bmp , true
Image is valid : a.JPG , true
Image is valid : a.GIF , true
Image is valid : a.PNG , true
Image is valid : a.BMP , true
Image is valid : a.JpG , true
Image is valid : a.GiF , true
Image is valid : a.PnG , true
Image is valid : a.BmP , true
Image is valid : jpg.jpg , true
Image is valid : gif.gif , true
Image is valid : png.png , true
Image is valid : bmp.bmp , true
Image is valid : .jpg , false
Image is valid : .gif , false
Image is valid : .png , false
Image is valid : .bmp , false
Image is valid :  .jpg , false
Image is valid :  .gif , false
Image is valid :  .png , false
Image is valid :  .bmp , false
Image is valid : a.txt , false
Image is valid : a.exe , false
Image is valid : a. , false
Image is valid : a.mp3 , false
Image is valid : jpg , false
Image is valid : gif , false
Image is valid : png , false
Image is valid : bmp , false
PASSED: ValidImageTest([Ljava.lang.String;@1d4c61c)
PASSED: InValidImageTest([Ljava.lang.String;@116471f)
&nbsp;
===============================================
    com.mkyong.regex.ImageValidatorTest
    Tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Skips: 0
===============================================
&nbsp;
&nbsp;
===============================================
mkyong
Total tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Skips: 0
===============================================</pre></div></div><p>Want to learn more about regular expression? Highly recommend this best and classic book &#8211; &#8220;Mastering Regular Expression&#8221;<br /><center><br /> <iframe src="http://rcm.amazon.com/e/cm?t=progrlife-20&#038;o=1&#038;p=8&#038;l=as1&#038;asins=0596528124&#038;fc1=000000&#038;IS2=1&#038;lt1=_blank&#038;m=amazon&#038;lc1=0000FF&#038;bc1=000000&#038;bg1=FFFFFF&#038;f=ifr" style="width:120px;height:240px;" scrolling="no" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" frameborder="0"></iframe><br /></center></p><div id="post-meta-extra"> Tags : <span class="post-tag"><a href="http://www.mkyong.com/tag/image/" rel="tag">image</a> <a href="http://www.mkyong.com/tag/regex/" rel="tag">regex</a></span></div><div style="margin:20px 0;"><center><script type="text/javascript">google_ad_client="ca-pub-2836379775501347";google_ad_slot="7146814087";google_ad_width=300;google_ad_height=250;google_ad_region="mkyongregion";</script><script type="text/javascript"

I tried this but it wont give me file extension when I am in SharePoint Workflow&#8217;s RegEx which is supposed to honor .net regex.</p></div><div class="reply"> <a class='comment-reply-link' id="comment-136313" class="comment"><div class="comment-author vcard"> <img alt='' src='http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/41215c4c449bd8b8b439e3d9ee949692?s=50&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mkyong.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Fmkyongnew%2Fimages%2Favatar-guest.jpg%3Fs%3D50&amp;r=G' class='avatar avatar-50 photo' height='50' width='50' /><span class="fn"><a href='http://jtsternberg.com/about' rel='external nofollow' class='url'>Justin Sternberg</a></span> <span class="comments-date">July 19, 2013 at 11:58 pm</span><div class="clearboth"></div></div><div class="comment-content"><p>This doesn&#8217;t account for query args in the url:</p><p>Should Pass:<br /> test/test.jpg?blah=blah (doesn&#8217;t pass)<br /> file.jpg<br /> file.png<br /> file.gif<br /> test/file?test.jpg</p><p>Should NOT Pass:<br /> test/jpg?blah=blah<br /> test/test.html?blah=test.jpg (Passes)<br /> test/test.jpg.mp3<br /> file.jpg.mp3<br /> file.mp3</p></div><div class="reply"> <a class='comment-reply-link' href='/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-image-file-extension-with-regular-expression/?replytocom=136313#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm("comment-136313", "136313", "respond", Please also give me the regular expression for strings NOT HAVING bmp, png, jpg and gif extension.</p><p>Regards<br /> Senthil</p></div><div class="reply"> <a class='comment-reply-link' href='/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-image-file-extension-with-regular-expression/?replytocom=112843#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm("comment-112843", "112843", "respond", "1925")'><button class="btn btn-info">Reply</button></a></div><div class="clearboth"></div></div></li><li class="comment even thread-even depth-1 comment-box" id="li-comment-85956"><div id="comment-85956" class="comment"><div class="comment-author vcard"> <img alt='' src='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/f5248c276f48e5f9b44f4bc4af93d870?s=50&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mkyong.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Fmkyongnew%2Fimages%2Favatar-guest.jpg%3Fs%3D50&amp;r=G' class='avatar avatar-50 photo' height='50' width='50' /><span class="fn">Allan Schepis</span> <span class="comments-date">August 24, 2012 at 3:19 am</span><div class="clearboth"></div></div><div class="comment-content"><p>Wow, just&#8230; wow. You went amazingly in depth there, thank you! This is deserving of lots of shares!</p></div><div class="reply"> <a class='comment-reply-link' href='/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-image-file-extension-with-regular-expression/?replytocom=85956#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm("comment-85956", "85956", "respond", "1925")'><button class="btn btn-info">Reply</button></a></div><div class="clearboth"></div></div></li></li><li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1 comment-box" id="li-comment-77543"><div id="comment-77543" class="comment"><div class="comment-author vcard"> <img alt='' src='http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/13ad354f48ad1a2e0a449e5e45546354?s=50&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mkyong.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Fmkyongnew%2Fimages%2Favatar-guest.jpg%3Fs%3D50&amp;r=G' class='avatar avatar-50 photo' height='50' width='50' /><span class="fn">Dan</span> <span class="comments-date">February 22, 2012 at 1:36 pm</span><div class="clearboth"></div></div><div class="comment-content"><p>Thank you for the informative post!</p></div><div class="reply"> <a class='comment-reply-link' href='/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-image-file-extension-with-regular-expression/?replytocom=77543#respond' onclick='return addComment.moveForm("comment-77543", "77543", "respond", "1925")'><button class="btn btn-info">Reply</button></a></div><div class="clearboth"></div></div></li></li></ol><div id="respond" class="comment-respond"><h3 id="reply-title" class="comment-reply-title"><h4 class="reply-title">What is your opinion?</h4> <small><a rel="nofollow" id="cancel-comment-reply-link" href="/regular-expressions/how-to-validate-image-file-extension-with-regular-expression/#respond" style="display:none;"><button style='float:right;padding:10px' class='btn btn-danger cancel-reply'>Cancel Reply</button></a></small></h3><form action="http://www.mkyong.com/wp-comments-post.php" method="post" id="commentform" class="comment-form"><p class="comment-notes">Your email address will not be published. Required fields are marked <span class="required">*</span></p><p><input id="author" name="author" type="text" value="" size="30" /><span class="comment-form-label">Name<span class="required"> * </span></span></p><p><input id="email" name="email" type="text" value="" size="30" /><span class="comment-form-label">Email<span class="required"> * </span></span></p><p><input id="url" name="url" type="text" value="" size="30" /><span class="comment-form-label">Website</span></p><p class="comment-form-comment" id="comment-form-textarea"><label for="comment">Comment</label><textarea id="comment" name="comment" cols="90" rows="10" aria-required="true"></textarea></p><div class="note"><strong>Note</strong><br>To post source code in comment, uses <code>&lt;pre lang="java"&gt; source code &lt;/pre&gt;</code></div><p class="form-submit"> <input name="submit" type="submit" id="submit" value="Post Comment" /> <input type='hidden' name='comment_post_ID' value='1925' id='comment_post_ID' /> <input type='hidden' name='comment_parent' id='comment_parent' value='0' /></p><p style="display: none;"><input type="hidden" id="akismet_comment_nonce" name="akismet_comment_nonce" value="8ed9baf06c" /></p><p style="clear: both;" class="subscribe-to-comments"> <input type="checkbox" name="subscribe" id="subscribe" value="subscribe" style="width: auto;" /> <label for="subscribe">Notify me of followup comments via e-mail</label></p></form></div></div></div></div><!-- google_ad_section_end --></div><div class="span4"><div id="sidebar"><div class="sidebar-ads"><script type="text/javascript">google_ad_client="ca-pub-2836379775501347";google_ad_slot="7072877400";google_ad_width=300;google_ad_height=250;google_ad_region="mkyongregion";</script><script type="text/javascript"
